In department stores, we're focusing on expanding in the Shinjuku Marui Annex. We've been active in Hong Kong for over ten years, but last year, we also began sales in Belgium, Spain, and Holland. 6. We offer platform shoes that distinguish themselves with their unusual materials and color combinations. 8. We are published every month in the gothic Lolita magazine KERA, and we are frequently used as the choice of on-stage clothing for Japan's Akihabara-style idol groups, artists, and events. We are also frequently chosen for the outfits worn at live events by Japanese voice actors in TV dramas, movies, and anime.
